review: Arrived within 2 days thanks to Amazon Prime. I ordered the stick due to the many features of streaming capability. And the Amazon Fire TV Remote app in iOS was a huge selling point. You can do an array of things with the pre loaded items on the stick. However if you want to unleash the full potential of this device you will need to side load Kodi on it. With this you have the entire streaming world at your fingertips. Thanks Amazon!
